articles.title: Python
articles.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python has a vast standard library and is commonly used for web development (Django, Flask), data analysis (Pandas, NumPy), machine learning (TensorFlow, scikit-learn), and automation. Its syntax is designed to be clean and easy to learn, making it a popular choice for beginners as well as experienced developers.
articles.creator: adm1
